sentences.en: A lineman is trying to repair the damaged pylon.
sentences.cn: 线务员正试图修理被损坏的电缆塔.

sentences.en: All 3 abilities are available right when the Dark Pylon is created.
sentences.cn: 黑暗水晶建造完的时候三个技能就都可用了.

sentences.en: Erection of the pylon required a crane of 1000 ton capacity.
sentences.cn: 塔架安装需用起重量达1000吨的吊机.

sentences.en: For example : Number 2 engine to pylon fire seal deteriorated.
sentences.cn: 二号发动机吊架防火封严老化.

sentences.en: No damage and fluid fluid leakage from engine pylon and cowling doors.
sentences.cn: 发动机吊架和整流罩无液压油渗漏和损伤.

sentences.en: South Pylon board , Munich - exhaustive list of amenities.
sentences.cn: 登上南塔, 慕尼黑的市容一览无遗.

sentences.en: Stays are continuous over saddles in the pylon.
sentences.cn: 拉索连续跨过塔架内的索鞍.

sentences.en: The A - frame pylon harmonizes with the tall spires of the adjacent cathedral.
sentences.cn: A形塔架同附近教堂的高耸尖塔十分协调.

sentences.en: The A - frame pylon harmonizes with the tall spires the adjacent cathedral.
sentences.cn: 形塔架同附近教堂的高耸尖塔十分协调.

sentences.en: The all - welded, A - frame pylon straddles the deck.
sentences.cn: 全焊接的A 形 框架式的塔柱与桥面叉开.

sentences.en: The cables intersect the tower or pylon at different heights.
sentences.cn: 钢索在桥塔或塔柱的不同高度上相交.

sentences.en: The conclusions of this paper offer reference for the design of no back - inclined pylon cable - stayed bridge .
sentences.cn: 本文的工作为无背索斜塔 斜拉桥 的设计提供了参考.

sentences.en: The helicopter lifted up the steel pylon, transported it to the site, and dropped it gently into place.
sentences.cn: 直升飞机把高压电缆铁塔吊起, 运至工地, 然后轻轻放下使之就位.

sentences.en: The method of restaggering OGV is more suitable for integrated pylon case.
sentences.cn: 该优化方法适合于一体化式吊架.

sentences.en: The pylon cell units were hoisted to the deck by the transfer derrick.
sentences.cn: 塔室块件由传递用的转臂吊机吊放在桥面上.
